summary:
A reskinned stand-alone Medium Scale set, armor, boots and gauntlets, with Ancient Nordic helm.
Good for vampire, daedra, and werewolf hunters.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=4]Crypt Hero Armor - V1.0 Initial Release
[/size][/b](Old Mod, Not Supported, Doesn't Work for Beast Races)[/center][center][/center]

This set is for Male and Female and is craftable and temperable. This is a Light Armor; stats are equivalent to Glass with weight, armor rating and value.
Requires no skill to craft. You can temper the boots, gauntlets and helm with no skill. You need the Arcane Blacksmith perk to temper the armor/cuirass.
The Armor Cuirass is enchanted to protect from disease, so you're less likely to get infected with various ailments from traps or Sanguinare Vampiris from vampires.

[b]Requires no DLC; this was made from Vanilla Skyrim Models.[/b]

This armor was created for my hunter character as I wanted something simple but more elegant looking than 'brown' to go tomb raiding with, that would still provide adequate protection.

[b][u]Complementary Mods[/u]:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32756]Silver Bows and Silver Arrows[/url] by Me
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29563]Ultra HD Silver Greatsword[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2531318]FrankFamily[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29143]Insanity's Silver Bow[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/258945]InsanitySorrow[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26617]Pauldrons - Morrowind Style[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2415025]kai1995[/url]

[b][u]Credits To[/u]:[/b]
'[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26770]aMidianBorn - Hide and Studded Hide[/url]' by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/571605]CaBal120[/url] for the original cuirass texture.
'[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24593]Ancestral Helms[/url]' by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/608894]Vipermkii[/url] for the helm idea.
author: Cat_Woman1989
